properties.script:
import requests

url = "$activity.definition_activity_028SGLH88GPI36h4IveStIuzsLXm05X80hH.output.parts[0]$/webhooks/$activity.definition_activity_028SETWGWVKJU0RhlZuvpRv9ICQRKnGkvBr.output.variable_workflow_027P5JFQ0SP106SOaK9zDE4KzgITsplp9Tk$"

querystring = {"api_key":"$activity.definition_activity_028SETWGWVKJU0RhlZuvpRv9ICQRKnGkvBr.output.variable_workflow_027QB1203EA8L2esNnMu54NvRsQLHdiT14N$"}

payload = $activity.definition_activity_029M4NMESZ8PJ4knRIIxBWgj1OvQItuHtf1.input.source_array[@].Webhook-Payload$
headers = {"Content-Type": "$activity.definition_activity_029M4NMESZ8PJ4knRIIxBWgj1OvQItuHtf1.input.source_array[@].Webhook-ContentType$"}
response = requests.request("POST", url, json=payload, headers=headers, params=querystring)

print(response.text)
